abilities.name: Spring Snipe
abilities.description: The user turns their legs into springs and launches themselves directly at an opponent with a powerful punch, using the spring compression for devastating impact.

abilities.name: Spring Transformation
abilities.description: The user can transform their limbs into springs, allowing for high-speed movement and powerful spring-loaded attacks.

keyMoments.title: Bellamy Demonstrates Full Spring Powers
keyMoments.description: Bellamy fully demonstrates his Bane Bane no Mi abilities in combat, using his spring-powered attacks to easily defeat Cricket, Masira, and Shoujou. He turns his legs into springs to launch himself at high velocities, overwhelming his opponents.
keyMoments.significance: First complete showcase of the Spring-Spring Fruit's combat applications and why it makes Bellamy a formidable fighter despite its limitations.

reveals.information: Spring Snipe technique - turns legs into springs for powerful launching attacks
The spring attacks can only propel the user in straight directions, making trajectory predictable

strengths: Allows user to launch themselves at extremely high speeds
Creates powerful momentum for devastating physical attacks
Can break apart solid surfaces with reactive force
weaknesses: Counter-attacks become more severe due to user's momentum
Requires solid surfaces to bounce from for maximum effectiveness

keyMoments.title: Robin Captures South Bird
keyMoments.description: Robin uses her Hana Hana no Mi to capture the elusive South Bird by sprouting multiple arms to restrain it, demonstrating the fruit's utility beyond combat situations.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the versatility of the Flower-Flower Fruit for practical applications like capturing animals or objects.

reveals.information: Hana Hana no Mi can be used for practical purposes like capturing fast-moving creatures
